      • drawSprite

        public static void drawSprite(float x,
                              float y,
                              float width,
                              float height,
                              Texture texture,
                              SpriteShader spriteShader)
        Parameters:
        x - - x position
        y - - y position
        width - - width of the sprite
        height - - height of the sprite
        texture - - texture of the sprite
        spriteShader - - the shader to use for the Sprite. If null it uses the default shader

        draws a single image with the default shader

      • drawSprite

        public static void drawSprite(float x,
                              float y,
                              float width,
                              float height,
                              java.awt.Color color,
                              ColorShader colorShader)
        Parameters:
        x - - x position
        y - - y position
        width - - width of the sprite
        height - - height of the sprite
        color - - color of the sprite
        colorShader - - the shader to use for the Sprite. If null it uses the default shader

        draws a single image with the default shader
